urn:contentItem:3S4Y-DVF0-0017-G11P-00000-00Opposition leader may discuss national unity government with Mobutu1996-11-21T00:00:00Z2020-08-04T18:52:36ZLexisNexisPart 5 Africa, Latin America, and the Caribbean; AFRICA; GREAT LAKES REGION; ZAIRE; AL/D2775/AOpposition leader may discuss national unity government with Mobutu

[6]

Text of report by Radio France Internationale on 19th November

The leader of the Zairean Radical Opposition, Etienne Tshisekedi, is expected in Paris on Thursday morning [21st November].

The Zairean press also reports that Mr Tshisekedi may also visit Marshal Mobutu at his villa in southeastern France to suggest the formation of a national unity government to replace that of the incumbent prime minister, [Leon] Kengo wa Dondo.

Source: Radio France Internationale, Paris, in French 1830 gmt 19 Nov 96
